Dead by Daylight is a very interesting take on the survival horror genre - succeeding where many other games of a similar calibre haven't had quite the same level of success.

It pits four vulnerable survivors against one bloodthirsty killer.

There are a plethora of both survivors and killers to choose from, with many recognisable licensed horror characters such as Michael Myers and Freddy Krueger. They all have their own unique perks and killer abilities, and the roster is always steadily increasing.

Dead by Daylight is a very addicting game with massive replayability and variety, which is why it is still one of the top played games on Steam more than three years after its initial release.

In respect of the massive ongoing support of this game, and the sheer fun it has brought me over the past few years, I'm more than happy to recommend it to anyone with an interest in survival horror games.

As of 11/30/19, I would highly recommend finding a different game to play. Never have I seen a more ridiculous execution of game mechanics from a developer. This game is so terribly unbalanced and has so many passives and abilities that will make you question why to even bother playing. In any amount of player groups the only resemblances of fun i've had in this game is from the custom modes where we limit/ban players from using certain perks and/or characters. In said scenario it was highly enjoyable but it require five players and only five to be balanced or anywhere near fun for anyone. Even then, the salt piles will still build up as one character feels isolated or targeted by the killer. There is no good way to play this game is what i'm trying to say. And if you're looking for a good time for friends or family then perhaps try jackbox.

Всем здравствуйте . Неоднозначно мнение моё о Dbd, так как игра действительно хороша, но много багов, которые очень сильно мешают геймплею. Первые 500 часов (это не ежедневный мой аккаунт), я играл на одном дыхании, но теперь всё стало не очень,а именно с новыми серверами. Палеты пробиваются, как не должны, орех не спасёт от хита, хиты у топоров Ани размером в 3 сурва, обычные хиты начали бить дальше, что ломает все тайминги. Но, всё же, игра хорошая, интересная игра, в которую можно играть по разному: хочешь, всю катку стелси, хочешь бери фонарь и мансуй как батька, можешь бегать от гена к гену или же спасать своих. Плюсов в этой игре однозначно больше, так что советую. (но переждать надо сервера)
9 ударов через доску из 10

Just played a game where I was hiding in a completely covered hiding spot twice in one game and the killer came rushing across the map and straight to my location (on both occasions, without me triggering any meaningful event like missing a skill check). Either the killer was using wallhacks and the game has ineffective anti-cheat, or there are overpowered perks that allow you to see survivors through walls. In the latter case, you have to memorize numerous killers each with their unique gameplay-altering abilities in order to anticipate and play around your opponent's actions. The staleness and buy-to-win aspects that other reviewers mentioned didn't bother me as much.
Hide & Seek + Tag + Murder + Skill = This Game.

The community is too toxic. When i play killer, survivors use the cheapest,dirtiest,most toxic tactics to win that it sucks the fun out of even playing the game. 3/10.

DC penalty is terrible behaviour. Either remove it or make the penalty different.
Punishing people who don't play the game by not letting them play the game is stupid.

if anything the dc penalty discourages players. anyone with a bad wifi connection could get the penalty for absolutely no reason.behaviour sadly wont listen to the community. instead they do whatever they want (which i dont normally mind. it is their game after all.) but when you call the community your "family" like you did during the "delayed" binding of kin chapter notes. you simply show yourself as a big headed company whos only in it for the money. and is only pretending to be nice and caring to the community just for said money. which is simply a douchebag move. just remove the damn dc penalty or change it behaviour. noone should be kept from playing the game simply because their wifi connection dies or if the other party is playing dirty and bullying the other side.

Edit: 5:45PM 12/29/21
I just went against 4 toxic survivors who went out of their way to be toxic and ruin my fun simply because it was funny to them. Id like flashlights (more specifically the iridescent flashlight addon) to be nerfed so that survivors cant use them just to be rude and bully. Also please rework the MMR. at this point anyone can just abuse mmr to bully new killers and it is sickening. I may not be new but my mmr is low due to constant shit being forced upon me by toxic survivors. And I'd like for boon totems to be nerfed. at this point they are too op to go against and it is very aggrivating to play. The Boon perks should be Breakable permanently instead of just easily replaceable. Why give survivors an unneeded advantage when they have flashlights, and other items to make the killer's life a living hell.

also as an extra note. THE ONLY REASON FOR A PERMA BAN SHOULD BE HACKING. there is no reason to perma ban someone just for being pissed off at the opposing side for being dicks.

Edit 5/13/22

Fuck the disconnect penalty. behaviour please fix it so that its not going over an hour. you shouldnt need 6hrs+ to "cool off." i still believe punishing survivors that dont want to play in a match by not letting them play in matches is still not cool. but id be fine if the cap was 1 hour. at the end of the day when i come back from a 24 hr penalty im more pissed off than anything else. especially when the entire reason i dced in the first place was because a 4 man survive with friends is going out of their way to make the match pure hell.
I'm lowering my rating to 2/10. the only GOOD thing about the game now is the licensed material. and even then it's subpar compared to shit like grand theft auto and resident evil. the latter being something YOU decided to mooch off of for more players.
